extendedInfo.description: Hi Dialer is an iPhone Style and Android Capability Dialer&Contacts app. Very cool UI and easy to use. You can get the exciting iPhone user experience and android capability in Android Phone!Major Feature:- Support iPhone iOS 6 UI Style and contacts and dailer feature- Support same look and touch feeling with iPhone- Support quick find by letter, name, company, keyword.- Support favorite contact- Support backup &restore from SD card, safe and secure.- Support import contact from sim card- Support sync contact with Gmail- Support call log order by all and missed- Support the full screen call ID with incoming and outgoing call. By default is off, pls enable it in setting- Support auto send sms when refuse the incoming call- Support android 2.2 devices- Support alphabetical list of contacts group- Support Samsung Galaxy S4 and HTC one- Support 1080P resolutionIf you meet any issue, pls don't just rate one star. We hope your email the issue to hidevstudio(at)gmail.com, we will definitely feedback and resolve your issue asap.Or follow usFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/HiDevStudioTwitter:https://twitter.com/hidevstudioLet's go to enjoy it!Tag: iPhone 5, iPhone 4S,iPhone Style, iOS, Contacts, Dialer, Phonebook, Call log,Gmail Sync, Full Screen Call ID, FSCIiOS 7 theme will come soon. This app is ad-supported. Search for 'Hi Contact Pro' for ad-free version.You can get more iPhone Style and Android capability Apps in "Hi Dev Studio".Thanks!

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: I like the IPhone style index down the side of the contacts. The dialer would be cooler if it maintained the iPhone style throughout the call instead of switching to stock . But I like the contact list so much that I will continue to use this.
reviews.author: Scott A

reviews.title: Fix my problem?
reviews.comment: When I put people in my phonebook it don\'t seem to appear on the app and when I ring people it ain\'t like the Iphone as shown in picture. Please fix these for a five star.

reviews.title: Really good!!! :) but.... :/
reviews.comment: When people call me it\'s perfect and the iPhone theme really does show, but when I call them it usually shows only the stock Android dial,if you change this it will be perfect.overall its a great app :)

reviews.author: Shakti Mehta

reviews.title: It\'s really good but....
reviews.comment: .... there are a few things that could make it great.  First I really like the app and where it\'s trying to go. My main issues are when you make or receive a call it goes back to the android version. Secondly, the font is WAY too small on the contact name when you are receiving a call or making a call-the persons name at the top of the screen is tiny. It\'s not anywhere near that small on my wife\'s iPhone so if you could make it bigger and more similar to the iPhone that would solve that issue.
